backend/main.mo: Core backend actor managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, access control, and storage with multiple public methods and type definitions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state types and a passthrough run function for upgrading persisted data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented Twitter thumbnail-fetching features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files and components for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router routes for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages plus layout logic for header/footer visibility.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, removing, and searching GIF-based avatars with Giphy integration and debounced search.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Displays the chat interface, handles message fetching, sending, replying, scrolling, and pinned video logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails, Twitter previews, and metadata like views and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog to create chatrooms with topic, description, media uploads, and YouTube/Twitch/Twitter link validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling username editing, avatar selection, and navigation back to the lobby.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder that intentionally renders nothing since authentication is not used.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual messages with reactions, replies, media embeds, and optional pinning or highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides a chat input supporting text, images, videos, Twitter links, and voice recording with validation and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in chat and allows unpinning via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player for voice messages with waveform visualization and playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and providing login/clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chat-related queries and mutations including chatroom fetching, search, and message handling with local user metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables plus custom styles for inputs and a voice message range slider.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines Giphy API key and result limit constants.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a function to format numbers into compact k/M/B notation.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy search and trending fetch helpers returning normalized GIF data with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Clientâ€‘side image compression utility that resizes, recompresses, and returns optimized image files.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract preview data with caching and deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: LocalStorage cache utility for storing and validating Twitter oEmbed previews.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utilities for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating related thumbnail URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and loading global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page that authenticates via a hardcoded password before listing chatrooms and allowing deletion with confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count, handles loading and not-found errors, and renders the chat interface.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby with chatroom search, category filtering, and creation, switching data sources based on active filters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing feature requirements for extracting Twitter post images for thumbnails and overall project context.
